availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nathaniel W. Warfield (Oldham County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, resident. Native of Paris, France. Married to Alice W. Estill Warfield in Oldham County, Kentucky, on June 5, 1860. Father of Stella Warfield. Resident of Oldham County in 1860. Household owned fourteen enslaved persons in Oldham County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 895.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 170A-B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 5, p. 559B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Madison County Marriages, Film 000482450.
"Nathaniel W. Warfield (1834-1908)," Find A Grave, Memorial #82715582, accessed March 4, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/82715582.
